person.persName: John Clay Horne (Hickman County, Kentucky, resident and soldier)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Served in the 22nd Tennessee Volunteer Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a first lieutenant. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a captain from May 8, 1862.
